extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing utility methods.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int button(java.awt.event.InputEvent e)
      Returns the button of an input mouse event : BasicInputStateMachine.NOBUTTON BasicInputStateMachine.BUTTON1 BasicInputStateMachine.BUTTON2 BasicInputStateMachine.BUTTON3 .
      static java.lang.String getButtonAsText(int button)
      Returns the text corresponding to a button for toString methods in Transition classes.
      static java.lang.String getModifiersAsText(int modifier)
      Returns the text corresponding to a modifier for toString methods in Transition classes.
      static java.lang.String getPrefixInputEvent(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Returns the string describing this awt key event ("KeyType", "KeyPress" or "KeyRelease").
      static java.lang.String getPrefixInputEvent(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
      Returns the string describing this awt mouse event ("Down", "Move", "Drag", "Release", "Click", "Enter", "Leave" or "Wheel") concatenated with the number of the mouse button (0, 1 or 2).
      static int modifiers(java.awt.event.InputEvent e)
      Returns the modifier of an input event : BasicInputStateMachine.NOMODIFIER BasicInputStateMachine.ALT BasicInputStateMachine.SHIFT BasicInputStateMachine.CONTROL BasicInputStateMachine.CONTROL_SHIFT BasicInputStateMachine.ALT_CONTROL BasicInputStateMachine.ALT_SHIFT BasicInputStateMachine.ALT_CONTROL_SHIFT .

      • getPrefixInputEvent

        public static java.lang.String getPrefixInputEvent(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
        Returns the string describing this awt mouse event ("Down", "Move", "Drag", "Release", "Click", "Enter", "Leave" or "Wheel") concatenated with the number of the mouse button (0, 1 or 2).
        Parameters:
        me - The awt mouse event.
        Returns:
        The string describing this awt mouse event.

      • modifiers

        public static int modifiers(java.awt.event.InputEvent e)
        Returns the modifier of an input event :
        • BasicInputStateMachine.NOMODIFIER
        • BasicInputStateMachine.ALT
        • BasicInputStateMachine.SHIFT
        • BasicInputStateMachine.CONTROL
        • BasicInputStateMachine.CONTROL_SHIFT
        • BasicInputStateMachine.ALT_CONTROL
        • BasicInputStateMachine.ALT_SHIFT
        • BasicInputStateMachine.ALT_CONTROL_SHIFT
        .
        Parameters:
        e - The awt input event.
        Returns:
        The modifier of the event e.

      • button

        public static int button(java.awt.event.InputEvent e)
        Returns the button of an input mouse event :

        • BasicInputStateMachine.BUTTON1
        • BasicInputStateMachine.BUTTON2
        • BasicInputStateMachine.BUTTON3

      • getButtonAsText

        public static java.lang.String getButtonAsText(int button)
        Returns the text corresponding to a button for toString methods in Transition classes. e.g. 
         getButtonAsText(BasicInputStateMachine.BUTTON1)
        returns "BUTTON1".
        Parameters:
        button - The button
        Returns:
        The corresponding text

      • getModifiersAsText

        public static java.lang.String getModifiersAsText(int modifier)
        Returns the text corresponding to a modifier for toString methods in Transition classes. e.g. 
         getModifiersAsText(BasicInputStateMachine.SHIFT)
        returns "SHIFT".
        Parameters:
        modifier - The modifier
        Returns:
        The corresponding text
